> **Filename:** 4666.mp4, 4666.gif

[[/<]]
-----
It's Chrimbus!
 
I was going to just leave it at that for this because I thought it'd be funny. But I wanted to talk about how I referenced an experience I had when I was really little for this one. I was SO unbelievably sure I saw a ghost on Christmas eve when I was like 4. In reality, it was probably just sheets blowing outside but it scared me for years.

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]

author: IronShears
